cbinstall.name: CB Gallery
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2015 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Adds photo, file, video, and music user galleries.

param.name: tab_photos
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of photos tab.

param.name: tab_files
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of files tab.

param.name: tab_videos
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of videos tab.

param.name: tab_music
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of music tab.

param.description: Enable or disable display of files tab.

param.description: Enable or disable display of videos tab.

param.description: Enable or disable display of music tab.

param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of photos tab.

param.description: Enable or disable display of files tab.

param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of videos tab.

param.name: tab_music
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of music tab.

param.name: tab_photos
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of photos tab.

param.name: tab_files
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of files tab.

param.name: tab_videos

param.description: Enable or disable display of videos tab.

param.name: tab_music
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of music tab.

param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB Gallery. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgallery/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB Gallery.

param.name: general_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of items when a user is deleted.

param.name: photos_item_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select item create access. Access determines who can create items. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_item_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Select the field to use for item create limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_item_limit_custom
param.label: Custom Create Limit
param.description: Input number of items each individual user is limited to creating. If blank allow unlimited items.

param.name: photos_item_upload
param.label: Upload
param.description: Enable or disable uploading of items.

param.name: photos_item_link
param.label: Link
param.description: Enable or disable linking of items. Linking allows items to be displayed in the gallery from external sources.

param.name: photos_resample
param.label: Always Resample
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should always be resampled. Resampling adds additional security, but animations will only be kept when using ImageMagick.

param.name: photos_image_height
param.label: Maximum Image Height
param.description: Input the maximum height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: photos_image_width
param.label: Maximum Image Width
param.description: Input the maximum width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: photos_thumbnail_height
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Height
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: photos_thumbnail_width
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Width
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: photos_maintain_aspect_ratio
param.label: Maintain Aspect Ratio
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should maintain their aspect ratio when resizing. If set to No the image will always be resized to the specified maximum width and height. If set to Yes the aspect ratio will be maintained as much as possible within the maximum width and height. If set to Yes with Cropping the image will always resize to the specified maximum width and height within the aspect ratio and crop any overflow; this is useful for maintain squared images.

param.name: photos_item_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum item file size in KBs.

param.name: photos_item_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum item file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: photos_item_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of items. Approval requires a moderator to publish a item before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_item_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on items. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_item_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for items needing approval.

param.name: photos_folder_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select folder create access. Access determines who can create folders. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_folder_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Select the field to use for folder create limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_folder_limit_custom
param.label: Custom Create Limit
param.description: Input number of folders each individual user is limited to creating. If blank allow unlimited folders.

param.name: photos_folder_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of folders. Approval requires a moderator to publish a folder before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_folder_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on folders. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: photos_folder_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for folders needing approval.

param.name: files_item_limit
param.label: Create Limit

param.name: files_item_limit_custom

param.name: files_item_upload
param.label: Upload

param.name: files_item_link
param.label: Link
param.description: Enable or disable linking of items. Linking allows items to be displayed in the gallery from external sources.

param.name: files_item_extensions
param.label: File Types
param.description: Input the allowed file extensions as a comma separated list.

param.name: files_item_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum item file size in KBs.

param.name: files_item_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum item file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: files_item_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of items. Approval requires a moderator to publish a item before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: files_item_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on items. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: files_item_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for items needing approval.

param.name: files_folder_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select folder create access. Access determines who can create folders. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: files_folder_limit
param.label: Create Limit

param.label: Custom Create Limit
param.description: Input number of folders each individual user is limited to creating. If blank allow unlimited folders.

param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on folders. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: files_folder_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for folders needing approval.
